name: Deep Sea Battleship Plus
description:
Become a Hero by stopping the invasion. Sink the enemy ships before it is too late, but avoid sinking your Alliance's ships. You are our last hope!

This FREE game includes 4 leaderboards, 57 achievements, 27 levels and 2 play modes (Open Sea and Survival).

Compete against the Best players.

The Plus version includes :

> No Ads
> Faster cannon reload (2 seconds to automatically reload instead of 3 seconds)
> 57 achievements instead of 43
